price: Dájúdájú Àwa, Àwa ń sọ (ẹ̀dá) di alààyè. A sì ń sọ ọ́ di òkú. Àwa sì ni A óò jogún (ẹ̀dá).
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lanaḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wanaḥnu al-wārithūna
